meanings.def: a person who has a lot of authority and manages and controls an activity, a place, a group of workers, etc.
examples: the superintendent of schools in Dallas
She was medical superintendent at the Institution for 28 years.

meanings.def: (in the UK) a police officer just above the rank of chief inspector
(in the US) the head of a police department
a person whose job is to be in charge of a building and make small repairs, etc. to it
